","type":"text/markdown","description":"markdown-it-mermaid"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/markdown-it-mermaid/markdown-it-mermaid.js":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/markdown-it-mermaid/markdown-it-mermaid.js","text":"const{mermaidAPI:e}=require("$:/plugins/orange/mermaid-tw5/mermaid.min.js");module.exports=e=>{e.renderer.rules.fence=(e,r,n,m,i)=>{const o=e[r];o.content.trim(),o.info}};","type":"application/javascript","module-type":"markdownit"}}}
